Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Financial/Business | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Thursdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 12, 2012

Show Me Your Money is inspired by a real pay experiment that happened during the 1950s. This television experiment sees one of the country's top bosses taking it upon himself to break the rules and encourage a more honest and open working environment.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32161)
